about.heroDescription: The World Legends Cup is a groundbreaking tournament that brings together the greatest footballers in history for one extraordinary celebration of the beautiful game.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.paragraph1: To honor and celebrate the achievements of legendary figures of football, fostering a sense of unity, pride, and inspiration across generations.
mission.paragraph2: By showcasing these remarkable players and their contributions, the event aims to inspire future generations, preserve the legacies of the past, and create unforgettable experiences that resonate on a global scale.
mission.paragraph3: This is more than a tournament—it's a tribute to the art of football and the heroes who have shaped its history.
